CustomField.formula:
IF( ISPICKVAL( gender__c ,'male'), IMAGE('https://truecallerphone-dev-ed--c.documentforce.com/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?id=0155i000000DJ1r&oid=00D5i0000011Xkt&lastMod=1650884009000','male logo' , 30, 40),
IF( ISPICKVAL( gender__c ,'female'),
IMAGE('https://truecallerphone-dev-ed--c.documentforce.com/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?id=0155i000000DJ1w&oid=00D5i0000011Xkt&lastMod=1650884195000','female logo' , 30, 40),
IMAGE('https://truecallerphone-dev-ed--c.documentforce.com/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?id=0155i000000DJ21&oid=00D5i0000011Xkt&lastMod=1650884245000', 'transgender' ,30,40))
)
CustomField.label: gender logo
